Kansainvälinen menettely kalusteiden ja keittiövarusteiden toimituksesta opiskelija- ja yliopistoasuntoloiden varustamiseksi sosiaalista osallistamista edistävää koulutusta koskevan hankkeen (CEB F/P 1746 (2011)) yhteydessä

Procédure internationale de fourniture d'équipements de cuisine et d'ameublement pour équiper les dortoirs destinés aux étudiants et aux universités dans le cadre du projet « Éducation pour l'insertion sociale » CEB F/P 1746 (2011)

Διεθνής διαδικασία για την προμήθεια επίπλων και εξοπλισμού κουζίνας για τον εξοπλισμό φοιτητικών και πανεπιστημιακών κοιτώνων στο πλαίσιο του προγράμματος «Εκπαίδευση για την κοινωνική ένταξη» CEB F / P 1746 (2011)

Procedura internazionale per l'acquisto di mobili e attrezzature da cucina da installare in dormitori per studenti e universitari nell'ambito del progetto "Education for Social Inclusion" (Istruzione per l'inclusione sociale) CEB F/P 1746 (2011)
Internationale procedure voor de aankoop van meubilair en keukenuitrusting voor de inrichting van studentenhuizen in het kader van het project „Onderwijs voor sociale inclusie” CEB F/P 1746 (2011)

Procedimento internacional para aquisição de mobiliário e equipamento de cozinha para equipamento de dormitórios de estudantes e universitários no âmbito do projeto «Educação para a Inclusão Social» CEB F/P 1746 (2011)
Internationellt förfarande avseende upphandling av möbler och köksutrustning för utrustande av student- och universitetsbostäder inom projektet "Utbildning för social integration" CEB F/P 1746 (2011)
Mezinárodní řízení pro zajištění nábytku a kuchyňského zařízení za účelem vybavení studentských a univerzitních kolejí v rámci projektu „Vzdělávání pro sociální začleňování“ CEB F/P 1746 (2011)
Rahvusvaheline menetlus projekti „Haridus sotsiaalne kaasatuse nimel“ CEB F/P 1746 (2011) raames üliõpilaste ja ülikooli ühiselamute varustamiseks mööbli ja köögitehnikaga

Bútorok és konyhai eszközök az „Oktatás a társadalmi befogadásért“ című projektben részt vevő tanulói és egyetemi kollégiumok számára történő beszerzésére irányuló nemzetközi közbeszerzési eljárás (CEB F/P 1746 (2011))
Tarptautinė procedūra dėl baldų ir virtuvės įrangos pirkimo studentų ir universitetų bendrabučiams įrengti vykdant projektą „Švietimas socialinei įtraukčiai“ CEB F/P 1746 (2011 m.)

Starptautiska procedūra par mēbeļu un virtuves aprīkojuma iepirkumu, lai aprīkotu studentu un universitāšu kopmītnes projekta “Izglītība sociālās iekļaušanas veicināšanai” ietvaros CEB F/P 1746 (2011)

Proċedura internazzjonali għall-ksib ta' għamara u tagħmir għall-kċina għat-tgħammir tad-dormitorji tal-istudenti u l-universitajiet fi ħdan il-proġett "Edukazzjoni għall-Inklużjoni Soċjali" CEB F/P 1746 (2011)

Międzynarodowa procedura zamówień publicznych w zakresie mebli kuchennych i urządzeń kuchennych w celu wyposażenia akademików studenckich w ramach projektu „Edukacja na rzecz włączenia społecznego” CEB F/P 1746 (2011)

Medzinárodné konanie na obstarávanie nábytku a kuchynského zariadenia na vybavenie študentských a vysokoškolských ubytovacích zariadení v rámci projektu „Vzdelávanie v záujme sociálneho začlenenia“ CEB F/P 1746 (2011)
Mednarodni postopek za naročilo pohištva in kuhinjske opreme za opremljanje študentskih in univerzitetnih domov v okviru projekta „Izobraževanje za socialno vključevanje“ CEB F/P 1746 (2011)

Nós imeachta idirnáisiúnta maidir le soláthar troscáin agus trealaimh chistine chun suanliosanna mac léinn agus ollscoileanna a threalmhú laistigh den tionscadal “Oideachas ar mhaithe le Cuimsiú Sóisialta” CEB F/P 1746 (2011)
Международна процедура за доставка на мебели и кухненско оборудване за обзавеждане на студентски и университетски общежития в рамките на проекта „Образование и социално включване“ CEB F/P 1746 (2011)

Procedura internațională de achiziționare a mobilierului și a echipamentelor de bucătărie pentru echiparea căminelor studențești și universitare în cadrul proiectului „Educație pentru Incluziune socială” CEB F/P 1746 (2011)
Međunarodni postupak nabave namještaja i kuhinjske opreme za opremanje studentskih i sveučilišnih domova unutar projekta „Obrazovanje za socijalnu uključenost“ CEB F/P 1746 (2011)

TI_DOC.P: RS-Beograd: International procedure for indkøb af møbler og køkkenudstyr til indretning af kollegier til studerende og universiteter inden for projektet »Education for Social Inclusion« CEB F/P 1746 (2011)

STI_DOC.P: No RS-MF-F/P 1746 (2011)-G-ICB-02/2017/MoESTD
PUBLIC INVITATION FOR SUBMITTING BIDS IN OPEN

CONTENTS.P: The Ministry of Education, Science and Technological Development of the Republic of Serbia (hereinafter referred to as “The Borrower”) is financing procurement of goods from a loan received from the Council of Europe Development Bank (CEB) – F/P 1746 (2011), concluded on 16 February 2012, for the realisation of the Project: “Education for Social Inclusion”, from which is going to be financed procurement of goods under this contract.

The objective of the Project is the procurement of furniture and kitchen equipment for the equipping of student and university dormitories in Uzice, Palic, Cacak, Trstenik, Kragujevac and Svilajnac within the Project “Education for Social Inclusion”.
Procurement is divided into two lots:
— Lot No. 1 – Procurement of furniture,
— Lot No. 2 – Procurement of kitchen equipment.

The procurement of goods includes the delivery, installation, testing and commissioning of equipment according to the technical specification, including all necessary smaller construction works, in order to complete the assembly, testing and commissioning of the supplied equipment.

Public procurement will be conducted through the open international bidding procedures specified in the CEB Guidelines for Procurement of supply, works and services, version September 2011, as specified under the Framework Loan Agreement F/P 1764 (2011).
Public procurement is open to bidders from all countries in accordance with the above-written CEB Guidelines.
This commencement period for the implementation of this contract is to be expected from the second quarter of 2018.

The Tender evaluation criterion is "Lowest Evaluated Bid Price". Bids will then be ranked from the lowest to the highest price. The lowest evaluated and technically responsive bid is the most favourable. This provision applies to all lots.
Interested Bidders may request additional information at the latest on 21 February 2018 at the following address from 10:00 to 12:00 Central European time every working day:
Ministry of Education, science and technological development
22-26 Nemanjina St., VI floor, Office No. 15
11000 Belgrade, Republic of Serbia
Contact person is Branislav Cvejic
A complete set of tender documents may be obtained on the submission of an application to the above-written address, bearing the name of the project and number of public procurement.

On the request, the Tender Documents may be sent by courier service if the transport is previously provided by the Bidder in his country. The Borrower bears no responsibility for the delivery in such a case.

A Tender security is requested in the form of unconditional bank guarantee issued by the bank. The tender warranty statement is not required. The amount and currency of the tender guarantee shall be 2 % of the value of the submitted bid per Lot (EUR). Tender Guarantee must be submitted separately for each Lot.

Site visits are mandatory. Only authorized representatives of the bidders who requested Tender documentation will be able to attend site visits. The Certificates of attendance will be issued at the end of the site visits.

The Bidders will need to register for the site visits at the latest until 26 January 2018, until 12:00 Central European time by an email: ceb@mpn.gov.rs. Site visits will be organized in line with the following schedule:
For Lot No. 1. - Cacak, Kragujevac, Palic, Svilajnac, Trstenik and Uzice in the period from 5 February 2018 to 12 February 2018 from 9:00 to 14:00 o’clock Central European time.
For Lot No. 2. - Cacak, Palic, Trstenik and Uzice in the period from 5 February 2018 to 12 February 2018 from 9:00 to 14:00 o’clock Central European time.
Bidders shall submit their offers in separate envelopes for each Lot. All bids must be delivered in closed envelopes bearing the following additional identification marks:
1. Number: RS-MF-F/P 1746 (2011)-G-ICB-02/2017/MoESTD and the name: „Procurement of furniture and kitchen equipment for the equipping of dormitories”,
2. Name and number of the Lot for which the bid is submitted.
Not later than 13 March 2018 until 12:00 o’clock Central European time, at the following address:
Ministry of education, science and technological development
Address: 22-26, Nemanjina Str.
Floor/ Number of office: VI floor, Office No. 15
City: Belgrade
ZIP/Postal Code: 11000
Country: The Republic of Serbia
The bid opening shall take place on 13 March 2018 at 15:00 o’clock Central European time in the presence of bidders’ representatives, at the following address:

ADDRESS_NOT_STRUCT.ORGANISATION: Ministry of Education, Science and Technological Development
ADDRESS_NOT_STRUCT.BLK_BTX: , Street Address: 22-26, Nemanjina Str., Floor/ Number of office: VI floor, Office No. 15, City:
, ZIP/Postal Code: 11000, Country: The Republic of Serbia

TI_DOC.P: RS-Bělehrad: Mezinárodní řízení pro zajištění nábytku a kuchyňského zařízení za účelem vybavení studentských a univerzitních kolejí v rámci projektu „Vzdělávání pro sociální začleňování“ CEB F/P 1746 (2011)

STI_DOC.P: No RS-MF-F/P 1746 (2011)-G-ICB-02/2017/MoESTD
PUBLIC INVITATION FOR SUBMITTING BIDS IN OPEN

CONTENTS.P: The Ministry of Education, Science and Technological Development of the Republic of Serbia (hereinafter referred to as “The Borrower”) is financing procurement of goods from a loan received from the Council of Europe Development Bank (CEB) – F/P 1746 (2011), concluded on 16 February 2012, for the realisation of the Project: “Education for Social Inclusion”, from which is going to be financed procurement of goods under this contract.

The objective of the Project is the procurement of furniture and kitchen equipment for the equipping of student and university dormitories in Uzice, Palic, Cacak, Trstenik, Kragujevac and Svilajnac within the Project “Education for Social Inclusion”.
Procurement is divided into two lots:
— Lot No. 1 – Procurement of furniture,
— Lot No. 2 – Procurement of kitchen equipment.

The procurement of goods includes the delivery, installation, testing and commissioning of equipment according to the technical specification, including all necessary smaller construction works, in order to complete the assembly, testing and commissioning of the supplied equipment.

Public procurement will be conducted through the open international bidding procedures specified in the CEB Guidelines for Procurement of supply, works and services, version September 2011, as specified under the Framework Loan Agreement F/P 1764 (2011).
Public procurement is open to bidders from all countries in accordance with the above-written CEB Guidelines.
This commencement period for the implementation of this contract is to be expected from the second quarter of 2018.

The Tender evaluation criterion is "Lowest Evaluated Bid Price". Bids will then be ranked from the lowest to the highest price. The lowest evaluated and technically responsive bid is the most favourable. This provision applies to all lots.
Interested Bidders may request additional information at the latest on 21 February 2018 at the following address from 10:00 to 12:00 Central European time every working day:
Ministry of Education, science and technological development
22-26 Nemanjina St., VI floor, Office No. 15
11000 Belgrade, Republic of Serbia
Contact person is Branislav Cvejic
A complete set of tender documents may be obtained on the submission of an application to the above-written address, bearing the name of the project and number of public procurement.

On the request, the Tender Documents may be sent by courier service if the transport is previously provided by the Bidder in his country. The Borrower bears no responsibility for the delivery in such a case.

A Tender security is requested in the form of unconditional bank guarantee issued by the bank. The tender warranty statement is not required. The amount and currency of the tender guarantee shall be 2 % of the value of the submitted bid per Lot (EUR). Tender Guarantee must be submitted separately for each Lot.

Site visits are mandatory. Only authorized representatives of the bidders who requested Tender documentation will be able to attend site visits. The Certificates of attendance will be issued at the end of the site visits.

The Bidders will need to register for the site visits at the latest until 26 January 2018, until 12:00 Central European time by an email: ceb@mpn.gov.rs. Site visits will be organized in line with the following schedule:
For Lot No. 1. - Cacak, Kragujevac, Palic, Svilajnac, Trstenik and Uzice in the period from 5 February 2018 to 12 February 2018 from 9:00 to 14:00 o’clock Central European time.
For Lot No. 2. - Cacak, Palic, Trstenik and Uzice in the period from 5 February 2018 to 12 February 2018 from 9:00 to 14:00 o’clock Central European time.
Bidders shall submit their offers in separate envelopes for each Lot. All bids must be delivered in closed envelopes bearing the following additional identification marks:
1. Number: RS-MF-F/P 1746 (2011)-G-ICB-02/2017/MoESTD and the name: „Procurement of furniture and kitchen equipment for the equipping of dormitories”,
2. Name and number of the Lot for which the bid is submitted.
Not later than 13 March 2018 until 12:00 o’clock Central European time, at the following address:
Ministry of education, science and technological development
Address: 22-26, Nemanjina Str.
Floor/ Number of office: VI floor, Office No. 15
City: Belgrade

Country: The Republic of Serbia

TI_DOC.P: RS-Belgrad: Międzynarodowa procedura zamówień publicznych w zakresie mebli kuchennych i urządzeń kuchennych w celu wyposażenia akademików studenckich w ramach projektu „Edukacja na rzecz włączenia społecznego” CEB F/P 1746 (2011)

STI_DOC.P: No RS-MF-F/P 1746 (2011)-G-ICB-02/2017/MoESTD
PUBLIC INVITATION FOR SUBMITTING BIDS IN OPEN

CONTENTS.P: The Ministry of Education, Science and Technological Development of the Republic of Serbia (hereinafter referred to as “The Borrower”) is financing procurement of goods from a loan received from the Council of Europe Development Bank (CEB) – F/P 1746 (2011), concluded on 16 February 2012, for the realisation of the Project: “Education for Social Inclusion”, from which is going to be financed procurement of goods under this contract.

The objective of the Project is the procurement of furniture and kitchen equipment for the equipping of student and university dormitories in Uzice, Palic, Cacak, Trstenik, Kragujevac and Svilajnac within the Project “Education for Social Inclusion”.
Procurement is divided into two lots:
— Lot No. 1 – Procurement of furniture,
— Lot No. 2 – Procurement of kitchen equipment.

The procurement of goods includes the delivery, installation, testing and commissioning of equipment according to the technical specification, including all necessary smaller construction works, in order to complete the assembly, testing and commissioning of the supplied equipment.

Public procurement will be conducted through the open international bidding procedures specified in the CEB Guidelines for Procurement of supply, works and services, version September 2011, as specified under the Framework Loan Agreement F/P 1764 (2011).
Public procurement is open to bidders from all countries in accordance with the above-written CEB Guidelines.
This commencement period for the implementation of this contract is to be expected from the second quarter of 2018.

The Tender evaluation criterion is "Lowest Evaluated Bid Price". Bids will then be ranked from the lowest to the highest price. The lowest evaluated and technically responsive bid is the most favourable. This provision applies to all lots.
Interested Bidders may request additional information at the latest on 21 February 2018 at the following address from 10:00 to 12:00 Central European time every working day:
Ministry of Education, science and technological development
22-26 Nemanjina St., VI floor, Office No. 15
11000 Belgrade, Republic of Serbia
Contact person is Branislav Cvejic
A complete set of tender documents may be obtained on the submission of an application to the above-written address, bearing the name of the project and number of public procurement.

On the request, the Tender Documents may be sent by courier service if the transport is previously provided by the Bidder in his country. The Borrower bears no responsibility for the delivery in such a case.

A Tender security is requested in the form of unconditional bank guarantee issued by the bank. The tender warranty statement is not required. The amount and currency of the tender guarantee shall be 2 % of the value of the submitted bid per Lot (EUR). Tender Guarantee must be submitted separately for each Lot.

Site visits are mandatory. Only authorized representatives of the bidders who requested Tender documentation will be able to attend site visits. The Certificates of attendance will be issued at the end of the site visits.

The Bidders will need to register for the site visits at the latest until 26 January 2018, until 12:00 Central European time by an email: ceb@mpn.gov.rs. Site visits will be organized in line with the following schedule:
For Lot No. 1. - Cacak, Kragujevac, Palic, Svilajnac, Trstenik and Uzice in the period from 5 February 2018 to 12 February 2018 from 9:00 to 14:00 o’clock Central European time.
For Lot No. 2. - Cacak, Palic, Trstenik and Uzice in the period from 5 February 2018 to 12 February 2018 from 9:00 to 14:00 o’clock Central European time.
Bidders shall submit their offers in separate envelopes for each Lot. All bids must be delivered in closed envelopes bearing the following additional identification marks:
1. Number: RS-MF-F/P 1746 (2011)-G-ICB-02/2017/MoESTD and the name: „Procurement of furniture and kitchen equipment for the equipping of dormitories”,
2. Name and number of the Lot for which the bid is submitted.
Not later than 13 March 2018 until 12:00 o’clock Central European time, at the following address:
Ministry of education, science and technological development
Address: 22-26, Nemanjina Str.
Floor/ Number of office: VI floor, Office No. 15
City: Belgrade
ZIP/Postal Code: 11000
Country: The Republic of Serbia
The bid opening shall take place on 13 March 2018 at 15:00 o’clock Central European time in the presence of bidders’ representatives, at the following address:

ADDRESS_NOT_STRUCT.ORGANISATION: Ministry of Education, Science and Technological Development
ADDRESS_NOT_STRUCT.BLK_BTX: , Street Address: 22-26, Nemanjina Str., Floor/ Number of office: VI floor, Office No. 15, City:

PUBLIC INVITATION FOR SUBMITTING BIDS IN OPEN

CONTENTS.P: The Ministry of Education, Science and Technological Development of the Republic of Serbia (hereinafter referred to as “The Borrower”) is financing procurement of goods from a loan received from the Council of Europe Development Bank (CEB) – F/P 1746 (2011), concluded on 16 February 2012, for the realisation of the Project: “Education for Social Inclusion”, from which is going to be financed procurement of goods under this contract.

The objective of the Project is the procurement of furniture and kitchen equipment for the equipping of student and university dormitories in Uzice, Palic, Cacak, Trstenik, Kragujevac and Svilajnac within the Project “Education for Social Inclusion”.
Procurement is divided into two lots:
— Lot No. 1 – Procurement of furniture,
— Lot No. 2 – Procurement of kitchen equipment.

The procurement of goods includes the delivery, installation, testing and commissioning of equipment according to the technical specification, including all necessary smaller construction works, in order to complete the assembly, testing and commissioning of the supplied equipment.

Public procurement will be conducted through the open international bidding procedures specified in the CEB Guidelines for Procurement of supply, works and services, version September 2011, as specified under the Framework Loan Agreement F/P 1764 (2011).
Public procurement is open to bidders from all countries in accordance with the above-written CEB Guidelines.
This commencement period for the implementation of this contract is to be expected from the second quarter of 2018.

The Tender evaluation criterion is "Lowest Evaluated Bid Price". Bids will then be ranked from the lowest to the highest price. The lowest evaluated and technically responsive bid is the most favourable. This provision applies to all lots.
Interested Bidders may request additional information at the latest on 21 February 2018 at the following address from 10:00 to 12:00 Central European time every working day:
Ministry of Education, science and technological development
22-26 Nemanjina St., VI floor, Office No. 15
11000 Belgrade, Republic of Serbia
Contact person is Branislav Cvejic
A complete set of tender documents may be obtained on the submission of an application to the above-written address, bearing the name of the project and number of public procurement.

On the request, the Tender Documents may be sent by courier service if the transport is previously provided by the Bidder in his country. The Borrower bears no responsibility for the delivery in such a case.

A Tender security is requested in the form of unconditional bank guarantee issued by the bank. The tender warranty statement is not required. The amount and currency of the tender guarantee shall be 2 % of the value of the submitted bid per Lot (EUR). Tender Guarantee must be submitted separately for each Lot.

Site visits are mandatory. Only authorized representatives of the bidders who requested Tender documentation will be able to attend site visits. The Certificates of attendance will be issued at the end of the site visits.

The Bidders will need to register for the site visits at the latest until 26 January 2018, until 12:00 Central European time by an email: ceb@mpn.gov.rs. Site visits will be organized in line with the following schedule:
For Lot No. 1. - Cacak, Kragujevac, Palic, Svilajnac, Trstenik and Uzice in the period from 5 February 2018 to 12 February 2018 from 9:00 to 14:00 o’clock Central European time.
For Lot No. 2. - Cacak, Palic, Trstenik and Uzice in the period from 5 February 2018 to 12 February 2018 from 9:00 to 14:00 o’clock Central European time.
Bidders shall submit their offers in separate envelopes for each Lot. All bids must be delivered in closed envelopes bearing the following additional identification marks:
1. Number: RS-MF-F/P 1746 (2011)-G-ICB-02/2017/MoESTD and the name: „Procurement of furniture and kitchen equipment for the equipping of dormitories”,
2. Name and number of the Lot for which the bid is submitted.
Not later than 13 March 2018 until 12:00 o’clock Central European time, at the following address:
Ministry of education, science and technological development
Address: 22-26, Nemanjina Str.
Floor/ Number of office: VI floor, Office No. 15
City: Belgrade
ZIP/Postal Code: 11000
Country: The Republic of Serbia
